entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers late this evening and overnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 early this evening then becoming light late this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon then rain. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 5. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain. Low plus 2.
